title: Binary Search

explanation.approach: Divide search space in half each time.
explanation.analogy: Like dictionary lookup - open to middle, go left or right.

title: Bubble Sort

explanation.approach: Bubble largest elements to end repeatedly.
explanation.analogy: Bubbles rise to top - large elements float up.

title: Selection Sort

explanation.approach: Find minimum, put in position, repeat.
explanation.analogy: Pick smallest card, then next smallest...

title: Insertion Sort

explanation.approach: Insert each element into sorted portion.
explanation.analogy: Like sorting cards in hand one by one.
steps: Insert in correct position in sorted part

title: String Length

explanation.analogy: Count steps until you hit the wall.

title: String Copy
String Compare

explanation.approach: Compare char by char, return difference.

title: Reverse String
Check Palindrome String
Count Vowels

explanation.analogy: Count A, E, I, O, U.

title: Count Words

explanation.approach: Count transitions from space to word.

title: Convert to Uppercase
Convert to Lowercase
